title: Coração Partido (Corazón Partío) - Ao Vivo
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Não tem jeito meu compadre, 'vambora
lines.translation: There's no way around it, my friend, let's go!
lines.grammar: Verbs: jeito. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'There's no way around it, my friend, let's go!'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Ela vacilou comigo, e nós 'tamo aí, tudo certo
lines.translation: She hesitated with me, but we're still here, everything's alright.
lines.grammar: Verbs: vacilou, comigo, 'tamo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'She hesitated with me, but we're still here, everything's alright.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu tentei ficar com você
lines.translation: I tried to stay with you.
lines.grammar: Verbs: tentei, ficar. Prepositions/case: com (with). Meaning: 'I tried to stay with you.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu lutei, insisti, persisti, mas você só brincou
lines.translation: I fought, I insisted, I persisted, but you just played games.
lines.grammar: Verbs: lutei, brincou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I fought, I insisted, I persisted, but you just played games.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Sempre me levou na brincadeira
lines.translation: He always took me in stride.
lines.grammar: Verbs: levou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'He always took me in stride.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E preferiu a vida de solteira
lines.translation: And she preferred the single life.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: a + article contracts (ao/à); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'And she preferred the single life.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Vida de balada, vida de revoada
lines.translation: Party life, flock life
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'Party life, flock life'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Agora vem se arrepender
lines.translation: Now you'll regret it.
lines.grammar: Verbs: arrepender. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Now you'll regret it.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Se você me amava
lines.translation: If you loved me
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'If you loved me'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Por que me machucou?
lines.translation: Why did you hurt me?
lines.grammar: Verbs: machucou. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path). Meaning: 'Why did you hurt me?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Se me amava, cê foi me trair por quê?
lines.translation: If you loved me, why did you betray me?
lines.grammar: Verbs: trair. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path). Meaning: 'If you loved me, why did you betray me?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu não vou negar que ainda te amo
lines.translation: I won't deny that I still love you.
lines.grammar: Verbs: vou, negar, amo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I won't deny that I still love you.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Mas você merece o meu abandono
lines.translation: But you deserve to be abandoned by me.
lines.grammar: Verbs: abandono. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But you deserve to be abandoned by me.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: O que eu mais queria era ficar contigo
lines.translation: What I wanted most was to be with you.
lines.grammar: Verbs: mais, ficar, contigo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'What I wanted most was to be with you.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Mas você deixou meu coração partido
lines.translation: But you broke my heart.
lines.grammar: Verbs: deixou, coração, partido. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But you broke my heart.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E agora, nem pintada de ouro eu te quero
lines.translation: And now, I don't want you even if you were painted gold.
lines.grammar: Verbs: ouro, quero. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'And now, I don't want you even if you were painted gold.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu não vou sentir pena de te ver sofrendo
lines.translation: I won't feel sorry for you seeing you suffer.
lines.grammar: Verbs: vou, sentir, ver. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'I won't feel sorry for you seeing you suffer.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.
